publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1854 Pauline McNeill: Sex Trade—That the Parliament notes the content of the ITV programme Vice – Inside Britain’s Sex Business: The New Slave Trade, broadcast on 10 April 2001, which highlighted the plight of an estimated 5,000 Eastern European women and girls who have been lured to the UK, held against their will and forced to act as prostitutes under the threat of violence with no passports and no money; further notes the identification of at least six addresses in Glasgow where this trade is known, and calls upon the Scottish Executive and the international authorities to take action to crush this crime, seek out the entrapped women, release them and provide a means for them to return to safety.
S1M-1854 Sex Trade (lodged on 23 April 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Michael Russell*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-1854 Sex Trade (lodged on 23 April 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Alex Neil*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S1M-1854 Sex Trade (lodged on 23 April 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr John McAllion*

S1M-1854 Pauline McNeill: Sex Trade—That the Parliament notes the content of the ITV programme Vice – Inside Britain’s Sex Business: The New Slave Trade, broadcast on 10 April 2001, which highlighted the plight of an estimated 5,000 Eastern European women and girls who have been lured to the UK, held against their will and forced to act as prostitutes under the threat of violence with no passports and no money; further notes the identification of at least six addresses in Glasgow where this trade is known, and calls upon the Scottish Executive and the international authorities to take action to crush this crime, seek out the entrapped women, release them and provide a means for them to return to safety. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alex Neil, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr John McAllion, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-1854 Sex Trade (lodged on 23 April 2001) Bristow Muldoon*
S1M-1854 Sex Trade (lodged on 23 April 2001) Irene Oldfather*, Tricia Marwick*, Christine Grahame*, Cathy Jamieson*
S1M-1854 Sex Trade (lodged on 23 April 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*, Trish Godman*

Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Russell, Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Alex Neil, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr John McAllion, Linda Fabiani, Bristow Muldoon, Irene Oldfather, Tricia Marwick, Christine Grahame, Cathy Jamieson, Mr Gil Paterson, Trish Godman

S1M-1854 Sex Trade (lodged on 23 April 2001) Nora Radcliffe*, Cathy Peattie*
S1M-1854 Sex Trade (lodged on 23 April 2001) Rhoda Grant*
